data.meanings: To lose father and child, lose direct heirs, be weary, tired, weak, have only remote relations.
data.sentence: The word كَلَّا comes from the root ك ل ل and is associated with the meanings: To lose father and child, lose direct heirs, be weary, tired, weak, have only remote relations.

data.meanings: To blaze, stir (fire), burn with (anger), furnace, flame.
data.sentence: The word لَظَى comes from the root ل ظ ي and is associated with the meanings: To blaze, stir (fire), burn with (anger), furnace, flame.
